Text: Amazing!!! Thank you so much. I have two little girls here who are thrilled with these new George episodes.

I was kinda excited to find this after many hours of internet search for season 2. My little boy likes Curious George. I was a little disappointed when I went through it and realized half of it is the first season and half the second. I have all of the first season, but none of the second. Half is better than none, and I thank you for providing some episodes we did not have.
